title: User account creation
description: As a user, I want to create an account so I can save my arrangements.

title: Secure login
description: As a user, I want to log in securely so my data is protected.

title: Instrument and level setup
description: As a student, I want to select my instrument and skill level so arrangements are tailored to me.

title: Upload sheet music
description: As a user, I want to upload PDF or MusicXML files so I can adapt them to my level.

title: Upload confirmation
description: As a user, I want to see a confirmation that the file was uploaded successfully.

title: Preview original sheet music
description: As a user, I want to preview the original sheet music after upload.

title: Select target level
description: As a student, I want to select a difficulty level so the arrangement suits my skills.

title: Choose arrangement mode
description: As a user, I want to choose between simplification or practice mode so I can tailor the output to my goal.

title: Receive simplified version
description: As a user, I want to receive a simplified version of my uploaded music that matches my selected level.

title: Preserve musical style
description: As a user, I want the output to maintain the style of the original music.

title: Download arranged sheet music
description: As a user, I want to download the new sheet music as a PDF or MusicXML.

title: Playback arrangement
description: As a student, I want to listen to the adapted arrangement so I can hear how it should sound.

title: Visual follow-along
description: As a user, I want to follow along visually as the sheet music plays back.

title: Adjust playback speed
description: As a student, I want to adjust playback speed so I can practice slowly.

title: View saved arrangements
description: As a user, I want to see a library of my adapted arrangements so I can revisit them later.

title: Rename or delete arrangements
description: As a user, I want to rename or delete saved arrangements.

title: Duplicate arrangements at new level
description: As a user, I want to duplicate a past arrangement with a different difficulty level.

title: Rate arrangements
description: As a user, I want to rate how helpful an arrangement was so the system can improve.

title: Leave comments
description: As a user, I want to leave comments on my experience.

title: File validation
description: As a system, I want to validate file types and size limits.

title: Notify on file parse error
description: As a system, I want to notify the user if file parsing fails.
